original_title: Marcelo Yuka no caminho das setas
overview: A documentary on the life of renowned Brazilian musician Marcelo Yuka, who was shot nine times in the streets of Rio de Janeiro in 2000 and became one of the main voices of social justice and peace in Brazil.
tagline: A musician with a social message, but nine gunshots put him in a wheelchair.
title: Marcelo Yuka: Follow the Signs
